TopicTitle: Planes, more parts for them... (squares ftw)

Articles.Content:
Hello fellow kerbonauts.

Addition of planes was one of the best things (at least for me) in kerbal, iv been building planes for hours by now, and lately i started to build replicas of existing planes, (boeings, concords b52 etc) sometimes they work better than just imagination but here is the thing.

There is to much circles, roundness, and i know it will be more and this is about rockets ( but this can be also translated into rockets) but i would die to make replicas of more 'advanced' planes/fighter jets such as those

Imagine having 'futuristic' fuselage with some awesome squared thrusters that would fit eatchother like a glove without empty spaces ( you cannot avoid them) how many new designs could that be, just by adding few new parts, my point is a litle less round more squared/triangular.

Or im blind and there is something like that in addon forums?
I agree, But I think there are more pressing issues at the moment.
